mapper.select: select modified is null or date(date_add(max(modified), interval 9 hour)) != date(date_add(now(), interval 9 hour)) as is_not_complete from answer where mainQuestId is not null and userId = ${user_id}
select id, title, number from mainquest where number = (select count(mainQuestId) + 1 as next_num from answer where mainQuestId is not null and userId = ${user_id})
mapper.insert: insert into answer(userId, mainQuestId, themeId, type, content, contry, agreeCnt, reportCnt) values (${userId}, ${mainQuestionId}, ${themeId}, 1, #{content}, #{country}, 0, 0)
